title.en: Ai ga Omosugiru Uchi no Yandere Kaineko

altTitles.ja: 愛が重すぎるうちのヤンデレ飼い猫

altTitles.pt-br: Meu amor é muito pesado, minha gata de estimação yandere

altTitles.ja-ro: Ai ga Omosugiru Uchi no Yandere Kai Neko

altTitles.en: My Yandere Cat Whose Love is Too Heavy

description.en: The "Ha Jaeyoung" whom Seou had a crush on in high school has died. Seou meets the deceased Ha Jaeyoung in a dream, and as the past is reenacted in the dream, Seou tries to change it to save him. Meanwhile, the death of another Ha Jaeyoung gets entangled, complicating the present. Before this dream that transcends time ends, can Seou save both Ha Jaeyoungs?
description.ko:
고등학생 때 짝사랑했던 '하재영'이 죽었다.
'서우'는 꿈에서 죽은 '하재영'을 만나고, 꿈에서 과거가 재현되자 그를 살리기 위해 과거를 바꾸려 한다.
한편, 또 다른 '하재영'의 죽음까지 엮이면서 현재는 복잡하게 변해가는데..
시간을 넘나드는 이 꿈이 끝나기 전, '서우'는 두 '하재영'을 모두 살릴 수 있을까?

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢転生おじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Reincarnated as a Villainess

altTitles.es-la: El Viejo que Reencarno como la Villana

description.en: After a traffic accident, 52-year-old civil servant Kenzaburou Tondabayashi awakens to find he's become Grace Auvergne, a duke's daughter, and more importantly the villainess of an otome game. Not wanting to get in the way of the happy endings of the young characters around him, Grace sets out to play the role of the villain, but whether it's due to Kenzaburou's memories of being an affectionate parent getting in the way or not being able to remember those pesky foreign names properly, it ends up being a lot harder than it looks…
description.id:
Setelah mengalami sebuah kecelakaan, seorang PNS berusia 52 tahun bernama kenzaburou tondabayashi tiba-tiba berada di tubuh seorang putri duke yang bernama grace auvergne, terlebih lagi, grace merupakan seorang villainess di sebuah game otome. Tidak ingin mengganggu happy ending anak-anak muda yang ada di dekatnya, grace memutuskan untuk menjalankan perannya sebagai seorang villainess, tapi mungkin karena ingatan kenzaburou yang dulunya merupakan seorang orang tua yang penuh kasih sayang atau karena tidak bisa mengingat nama-nama asing, akhirnya setiap grace ingin menjalankan peran villainessnya, grace selalu terganggu.
Sehingga dia merasa menjadi seorang villainess ternyata lebih sulit dari yang dia pikirkan...
description.es-la: Tras perder el conocimiento, después de realizar un acto heroico, el oficinista de 52 años, Kenzaburou Tondabayashi, despertó como Grace Auvergne, la hija de un duque perteneciente a un juego Otome y a su vez la villana de la historia. En un afán de querer cumplir su rol como villana para no afectar la historia del mundo, verá cómo su carácter de padre amoroso y de persona amable harán que su objetivo sea más difícil de lo que esperaba...

title.en: The Lecture You Would Never Want Your Parents to Give You

altTitles.ja: 親に絶対されたくない説教

altTitles.fr: Le sermon que vous ne voudriez jamais recevoir de vos parents

altTitles.ru: Лекция, которую вы бы не хотели услышать от родителей

altTitles.vi: Bài Thuyết Giáo mà ta Không bao giờ Muốn nghe từ phụ Huynh

altTitles.es-la: El regaño que nunca quisieras recibir de tus padres
La charla que nunca quieres que te den tus padres.

altTitles.en: Eastern Strange Legend of Wise Spirits - Cheating Detective Satori
Eastern Strange Legend of Wise Spirits - Foul Detective Satori

altTitles.pt-br: Estranha Lenda Oriental dos Sábios Espíritos  ~ A Detetive Trapaceira Satori

altTitles.ja: 東方智霊奇伝　反則探偵さとり

altTitles.vi: Đông Phương Trí Linh Kỳ Truyện ~ Thám Tử Bất Tuân Satori

description.en:
The fifth official Touhou manga (and the first webcomic) written by ZUN and originally drawn by Ginmokusei. 

Touhou Chireikiden focuses on Satori Komeiji's endeavors as a detective, solving mysteries around Gensokyo.

*Serialization was paused for a few months after volume 2 was finished due to the health concerns of the original artist Ginmokusei. The series resumed serialization with Yuu Akimaki as the new artist.*

- **Links:**
[Manga on NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/44569)
[Touhou Web Blog](https://touhougarakuta.com/comic/touhouchireikiden_1/)

- **New serialisation:**
[Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B0BQ5KZHYV)
[Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/356764/list/)
[EbookJapan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/701436/)
description.vi:
Manga chính thức thứ 5 của Touhou, kịch bản được viết bởi ZUN và được minh họa bởi Ginmonkusei (Sau này được đổi thành Akimaki Yuu vì sức khỏe của Ginmonkusei có vấn đề) 

Bộ truyện tập trung vào Satori Komeji, một yêu quái có khả năng đọc tâm trí người khác, cô bắt đầu trở thành thám tử và đi giải quyết các vụ án ở khắp Ảo Tưởng Hương.
description.es-la:
Cada vez que en Gensokyo se produce un incidente en el que está involucrado un youkai, la sacerdotisa Reimu Hakurei suele resolver la situación confrontando al culpable. Sin embargo, los casos en los que los culpables ocultan su identidad suelen ser demasiado complejos como para que la exterminadora de youkais se encargue de ello.

Entra en escena Satori Komeiji. Como youkai satori, posee un tercer ojo que le permite leer las mentes, detectando a cualquier criminal sin importar las mentiras que pueda inventarse. Con su extraordinaria aptitud como detective, Satori es capaz de resolver todos los misterios que se le plantea, aunque no siempre quiera salir de su mansión.
description.pt-br:
Touhou Chireikiden é a primeira webcomic oficial da série Touhou Project, escrita por ZUN com ilustrações da novata Ginmokusei, apresentando Satori Komeiji como a mestra detetive das profundezas da Terra.

Pode ser lido em japonês gratuitamente no web blog oficial: https://touhougarakuta.com/comic/touhouchireikiden_1/

altTitles.ja: ミスミさんは見透かせない

description.en: A romantic comedy about Yuri Tsuguto, who has clairvoyance but isn’t good at it, and Misumi Mitsuhashi, a girl who likes strange things. One day, when Yuri looks at Misumi’s back, he notices that her jacket is transparent and behind it is the message “If anyone can read this, come to the astronomy clubroom after school.” When he goes to the clubroom and explains his clairvoyance ability, Misumi becomes excited and asks “Why don’t you let me study you?”

Maruo, failed in his debut in high school and has become a bit of an outcast. He earns some extra money by taking spy photos of girls at school and selling them to boys. Recently, Maruo is concerned about Tabe, a girl who is always covered in scars and being bullied. He wants to help her, but he is afraid of being bullied. In addition, Tabe is also a target of his voyeurism, and Maruo feels self-loathing. Maruo's days are filled with worries, but a fact comes to light that brings him to the brink of despair.

title.en: I Thought She Was a Yandere, but Apparently She's Even Worse

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレかと思ったらもっとヤベー女だった

altTitles.id: Ku kira dia yandere tapi ternyata lebih parah

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレかと思ったらラブコメっぽくなる彼女

altTitles.ja-ro: Yandere Ka To Omottara Motto Yabe Onna Datta

altTitles.es-la: Pensé que era una yandere, pero resultó ser una chica mucho más peligrosa.

altTitles.tr: Onun Yandere Olduğunu Sanıyordum Ama Durum Daha Betermiş

description.en:
A man who no longer can turn a blind eye saves a girl who's being bullied by the other classmate, but little did he know.

---

**Notes:**
- There is also a fan colored version and an R18 side(?) story:
description.id: Seorang pria yang tidak lagi bisa menutup mata menyelamatkan seorang gadis yang di-bully oleh teman sekelasnya,tapi sedikit yang dia tahu.
description.tr: Artık sınıf arkadaşının zorbalanmasına göz yumamayan çocuk sınıf arkadaşını kurtarır, oysa...
description.es-la: Psicópata se enamora de un chico normal.

description.en: Maou Shaitan Geneha, a demon lord whose powers were sealed away, seeks out the descendant of the one who sealed her; company employee Shishibe Yashiro. Wanting Yashiro to undo the seal, Maou forms a contract with her, aiming to satisfy Yashiro in the hopes that she'll undo the seal.

altTitles.ja: 押しかけ女房、コドモ付き!

description.en: High school girl Kousaka Kako's life is turned upside down when two uninvited guests show up on her doorstep; Mirai, a self-proclaimed girl from the future, and Nozomi, who is supposedly Mirai and Kako's child.

Fujiyama Shinobu aka Sexy Fujiyama, is a general working for the evil Flower Bud Gang who are trying to take over the city. Standing in her way is the masked magical girl, Princess Mamu, who wouldn't you know it, has just moved in next door to Fujiyama's place...

“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”

title.en: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse

altTitles.tr: Yedi Ölümcül Günah: Mahşerin Dört Şövalyesi

description.en: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!
description.es:
La profecía se ha cumplido. "En un futuro no muy lejano, habrá cuatro caballeros sagrados que destruirán el mundo. Son los Cuatro Jinetes del Apocalipsis.""
Los santos caballeros que juraron fidelidad al rey Arturo estaban ansiosos por cortar el mal de raíz. Las consecuencias de estos acontecimientos llegan hasta la frontera... y sacuden el destino de un niño. Un niño que da el primer paso como le dice su corazón. ¿Qué le espera: sueños, esperanzas, gloria o pecado? La fantasía heroica del pasado y del presente, ¡el inicio!
description.fr: Percival vit seul avec son grand-père Bargis, au sommet d’une haute montagne nommée le “Doigt divin”. Il y mène une vie heureuse, préservé du monde extérieur. Mais le jour de ses 16 ans, son destin bascule : un mystérieux guerrier à l’armure rouge s’en prend violemment à lui et à son grand-père. En effet, ce Chevalier sacré de Camelot est chargé d’éliminer quiconque s’apparenterait aux “Four Knights of the Apocalypse”, un groupe de cavaliers qui, d’après la prophétie, apparaîtra pour renverser le roi Arthur… Laissé pour mort, Percival survit à ses blessures et décide de partir en quête de vengeance, et d’aventures !
description.ja:
『七つの大罪』正統続編！ 全世界待望の冒険ファンタジー!!

予言は示された。「遠くない未来、世界を滅ぼす四人の聖騎士が現れる。――その名を〈黙示録の四騎士〉」。厄災の芽を摘まんと色めき立つは、アーサー王に忠誠を誓いし一騎当千の聖騎士たち。その余波は、遠く辺境にまで及び……、一人の少年の運命を揺るがす！ 己が心の命ずるまま、一歩を踏み出す少年。その前途に待つは、夢か希望か栄光か罪か。古今無双のヒロイック・ファンタジー、開幕!!
description.pt: A profecia indicava que num futuro não muito distante, aparecerão quatro cavaleiros sagrados que destruirão o mundo: São os Quatro Cavaleiros do Apocalipse. Os quatro cavaleiros sagrados, que juraram fidelidade ao Rei Artur, estão muito animados para cortar esta calamidade pela raiz. As consequências chegam até à fronteira e abalam o destino de um rapaz, ......! Um rapaz dá um passo em frente como manda o seu coração. O que o espera é um sonho, uma esperança, glória ou pecado. Começa uma fantasia heróica dos mundos antigo e moderno!
description.tr: Nazik bir çocuk olan Percival, büyükbabasıyla birlikte "Tanrı'nın Parmağı" adlı uzak bir yerde yaşıyor. Ancak dünya onun barış içinde yaşamasına izin vermeyecektir. Gizemli bir şövalyeyle karşılaşmaları kaderlerini değiştirir ve şok edici bir sır ortaya çıkar. Çocuk sonsuz bir yolculuğa çıkar. "Yedi Ölümcül Günah"ı bilseniz de bilmeseniz de tadını çıkarabilirsiniz! Dünyanın en çok beklenen macera fantezisi!
description.uk: Історія є продовженням манги "Сім Смертних гріхів". Початок манги знайомить нас з Персівалем - шістнадцятирічний хлопець з ширяючого острова «Палець бога», який після певних подій вирушає в подорож чарівним королівством під назвою Британія.
description.es-la: Percival, un niño bondadoso, vive con su abuelo en un lugar remoto llamado "El dedo de Dios". Sin embargo, el mundo no le permite vivir en paz. Un encuentro con un misterioso caballero cambia su destino, y se revela un impactante secreto. El niño emprende un viaje interminable. Tanto si conoce "Los siete pecados capitales" como si no, ¡podrá disfrutar de él! ¡La fantasía de aventuras más esperada del mundo!
description.pt-br: Percival, um menino bem-humorado, vive com seu avô num lugar remoto chamado “O Dedo de Deus”. No entanto, o mundo não permite que ele viva em paz. Um encontro com um misterioso cavaleiro muda seu destino, e um segredo chocante é revelado. O menino embarca numa jornada sem fim.

altTitles.tr: Seraph of the End: Kıyamet Meleği

altTitles.pl: Seraph of the End: Serafin Dni Ostatnich

altTitles.en: Seraph of the End: Vampire Reign

description.en: One day, a mysterious virus appeared on Earth which killed every infected human over the age of 13. At the same time, vampires emerged from the world's dark recesses and enslaved mankind. Enter Hyakuya Yuuichirou, a young boy, who along with the rest of the children from his orphanage, are treated as livestock by the vampires. Even in captivity, Yuuichirou dreams big. He dreams of killing vampires. He dreams of killing them all.
description.ru:
В стремлении к запретным знаниям «человек разумный» опять напортачил — в 2012 году на волю вырвался смертельный вирус, начавший косить человечество. Умирали почему-то взрослые, и тут, откуда ни возьмись, явились вампиры и согнали оставшихся детей в свой подземный город, объявив, что отныне «людишки» будут жить под защитой клыкастых хозяев, расплачиваясь кровью. Резкий парень Юитиро пожил так 4 года и понял, что пора валить — вместе с названным братом Микой и всей «семьей Хьякуя», группой детей, выросшей в одном приюте. Конечно, вампиры легко догнали и перебили беглецов, ушел лишь один.   
Выйдя на поверхность, юный Хьякуя понял, что эпидемия кончилась, но мир изменился — кругом разруха, бродят демоны, а кровососы потихоньку расширяют территорию, предлагая жителям «крышу». Власть в Японии захватила семья Хиираги, сформировавшая Имперскую Демоническую армию, которая защищает людей и бьет вампиров зачарованным оружием. Свой путь Юитиро ясен — готовиться к службе, мстить за погибшую родню. Прямого и порывистого парня ждет немало сюрпризов и неожиданностей, но в таком поганом мире лучше надеяться на свой дар и свой меч, чем на волю судьбы и благосклонность правителей!
description.pt-br: Um dia, um vírus misterioso apareceu na Terra e matou todos os humanos infectados com mais de 13 anos. Ao mesmo tempo, vampiros emergiram dos recantos sombrios do mundo e escravizaram a humanidade. Entra Hyakuya Yuuichirou, um menino que, junto com o resto das crianças de seu orfanato, é tratado como gado pelos vampiros. Mesmo em cativeiro, Yuuichirou sonha grande. Ele sonha em matar vampiros. Ele sonha em matar todos eles.

description.en: In a town with no baseball team, young Bungo spends his days throwing the ball he received as a gift against a wall until Yukio Noda, Japanese representative youth baseball player, appears before him and an unexpected showdown ensues! After a chance meeting in middle school, these two enroll in Seio Senior where they struggle to make it to Koshien with everything they have.
description.pt-br: Em uma cidade sem time de beisebol, o jovem Bungo passa seus dias jogando a bola que recebeu como presente contra uma parede até que Yukio Noda, o jogador de beisebol jovem representante japonês, aparece diante dele e um confronto inesperado acontece! Depois de um encontro casual no ensino médio, esses dois se matriculam no Seio Senior, onde lutam para chegar a Koshien com tudo o que têm.

title.en: Hana Yori Dango: Boys Over Flowers

altTitles.es: No me lo digas con flores

description.en:
Eitoku Academy is a school that caters to children and from rich, high-society families. Hence, Makino, who comes from a poor family, is considered by others as the "weed" of the school. The school is ruled by the "Flower Four" group, more commonly known as the F4. The F4 leader, and son of the wealthiest, most powerful family in Japan, Domyouji Tsukasa, takes an interest in Tsukushi because she is the only girl at Eitoku who does not fawn over him. However, his hot-headed nature and bullying ways are originally a major turn-off for Tsukushi, who has her sights set on Rui Hanazawa.  
  
Volume 37 is comprised of three short stories that happen after the ending

Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games. A new modern exorcist saga now begins!
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!

altTitles.en: The Youngest Son of a Conglomerate
The Youngest Son of a Chaebol Family

altTitles.th: รีบอร์นริช

altTitles.fr: Le plus jeune petit fils du conglomérat

description.en: Having started from the bottom and worked his way to the top, Hyeonwoo finds himself betrayed by the royal family of Soonyang Group, the largest corporation in South Korea, after providing 13 years of dedicated service. Just when he thinks all his efforts have been made in vain and prepares to embrace his death, he suddenly wakes up in the body of Dojun Jin, the youngest grandson to the founder and CEO of Soonyang, having traveled back in time. Having been granted this second chance, Hyeonwoo begins to lay the foundation for his revenge against his evil relatives.

Betrayed and killed by his fellow Ninestar guild members, the powerful necromancer Cha Jin-Hyuk resorts to a daring soul transference.

A decade later, he awakens in a new body, devoid of his former powers. With the support of his new comrades, Spirit Master Balkan and hobgoblin Haryu, he embarks on a quest for vengeance, scaling the mysterious tower once again.

Only this time, he possesses the overpowered abilities of an All-Master, enabling him to master all the classes within the tower!
description.fr:
La tour. Un endroit inconnu avec de nombreux changements rapides.

Dix ans plus tard, je me suis réincarné dans le corps d'un garçon qui vit sur Terre, en Corée du Sud.

"Le type qui m'a poignardé dans le dos et celui qui est au-dessus de lui... Je vais leur faire la peau.

" La personne qui a atteint le sommet en tant que nécromancien et a atteint la classe supérieure, le Maître de l'Esprit Cha Jinhyuk. En tant que "All-Master", il prendra sa revanche en grimpant dans la tour en tant que nécromancien.

altTitles.en: I Want To Go Back Home.

description.ja:
平凡なサラリーマン×異世界=しょんぼり転生…!?
普通に働き、普通にご飯を食べ、普通に寝る。そんな平凡なハッピーで物足りた日常を過ごすサラリーマン・下山口一郎。
ある日突然、英雄として異世界に召喚されたけど、評価は★1つのハズレガチャ扱い……。
「嗚呼、もう帰りたい……」下山口の明日はどっちだ──!?

description.en: Overflowing wealth, exceptional looks. Ilya Bloden's life was perfect.Until she witnessed her fiancé's affair, that is."I changed everything, my taste, my hobbies, I accommodated his every wish… But I won't live like a pushover any longer. I'll get a perfect break up!"For the perfect break up, she finds a new fiancé, Karhan Evantheon. She tried to shield herself with Karhan's fearsome reputation, but…"I found this flower on the battlefield, and I really wanted Illya to see it."Turns out, he was a cute puppy?! Will this engagement be okay?
Keitarou, who's always had a disposition for attracting spirits, gets hired as a tutor for a little girl named Yayoi who can see spirits and is searching for the spirit that took away her mother.
description.vi: Keitarou, chàng trai có khả năng thu hút ma quỷ, được thuê làm gia sư cho một cô bé mang tên gọi Yayoi, người có thể trông thấy ma quỷ và đang trong công cuộc tìm kiếm con ma đã mang người mẹ của mình đi mất.

altTitles.ja: おかしなエルフと女子高生

altTitles.en: Sweets, Elf, And A High School Girl

description.en:
Japanese sweets save a debt-ridden elf!

Alice, an elf, runs a confectionery shop in the forest of Auin to pay off the debt left by her parents.
One day, however, when she is worried that her sweets are not selling, she suddenly falls into the "Fountain of Wishes.
When she opens her eyes, she finds herself in a strange world...

altTitles.ja: 聖なる乙女と秘めごとを

altTitles.en: The Holy Maiden and the Secret

description.en: “Please teach us naughty things.” One day, Itsuki is transported to another world, where he is confronted by sisters who serve the goddess. In order to return to the real world, he must give them practical sex education!

Ryuu, a super-businesslike transfer student from England with black hair and blue eyes just arrived! During the night of the Tanabata festival, Ryuu and Yukino became attracted to each other at first sight. He then declares, “You will be mine!” This brought confusion to Yukino, who has zero experience in love. But could she actually be falling in love

altTitles.ja: ツギハギだらけの最強勇者

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsugi hagi Darake no Saikyou Yuusha

description.en: Arikawa Ougi, 16 years old, suddenly found himself reincarnated as a zombie?! Embarking on a journey to subjugate the Demon Lord as a zombie hero, but the use of "power" requires a "price"...? A dark fantasy in another world.
description.ja: 【異世界×グロ×バトル】　転生先は、まさかのゾンビ！？　勇者ゾンビとして魔王討伐の旅に出るも、《力》の使用には《代償》が必要で…？　異世界系ダークファンタジー

description.en: An attractive smoking woman and a virgin boy crossing their paths during his campus days
description.es: Una mujer hermosa y un joven virgen entrelazándose juntos en sus días de universidad…
description.id: Menceritakan kisah senpai cantik serta cool dengan kouhainya yang masih perjaka. Kisah romance komedi yang sangat bagus.
description.ru: После старшей школы Кохай поступает в университет, где планирует начать встречаться с девушкой. Зайдя в кампус он замечает темноволосую девушку и подходит к ней с пачкой сигарет, желая привлечь её внимание. Несмотря на то, что Кохай терпит неудачу, он собирается идти до конца и добиться её сердца.
description.pt-br: Uma mulher atraente fumante, e um rapaz virgem cruzam seus caminhos durante seus dias no campus.

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

altTitles.zh-ro: Xiōng Tái Kànjiàn Wǒ Dìle Ma

description.en: The martial arts master Chu Wenshan has lost his memories, but the only clue to finding out about himself is a threatening letter… Huh? My brother was kidnapped? Wait, who’s my brother? No, even if I don’t know, I have to rescue him. Excuse me my friend, have you seen my brother?

High school student Kusakabe Makoto has to work all day to raise money for the treatment of his younger sister, who suffers from a serious illness. The father is unemployed, the mother ran away, leaving the children, bullying at work … Despite all this, he does not lose hope and continues to live for her sister. But having learned that she did not have long, Makoto falls into despair. Fear of the unknown causes him to take a different look at the value of human life.
description.ru: Старшекласснику Кусакабэ Макото приходится работать дни напролёт, чтобы собрать деньги на лечение младшей сестры, страдающей от тяжёлой болезни. Отец безработный, мать сбежала, бросив детей, издевательства на работе… Несмотря на всё это, он не теряет надежды и продолжает жить ради сестры. Но узнав, что ей осталось недолго, Макото впадает в отчаяние. Страх перед неизвестностью заставляет его по-другому взглянуть на ценность человеческой жизни.

description.en:
Ryoma Echizen just joined the Seishun Academy's tennis team, which is known for being one of the most competitive teams in Japan. Its members are incredibly talented, gifted, and athletic. With rigorous and extremely intense practices, the upperclassmen of the team expect the very best from themselves and they expect even more from the new members of the team. While most of the freshmen are on pins and needles hoping they won't get cut from the team, Ryoma Echizen is confident, cool, and collected. Some might even say he's cocky, but at least he's got the skills to back up his attitude. With his virtually unreturnable "twist serve," Ryoma is sure to make the starting team.  
  
Join Ryoma and the other first years, as they train hard, make friends, and try to find a place for themselves on the team. Ryoma Echizen is the Prince of Tennis. He may be ready for the Seishun Academy tennis team, but are THEY ready for HIM?

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: モンスターシュタイン

description.en:
A few decades back, humanity went to war against strange beings such as werewolves and witches, and was on the verge of defeat.

The solution to breaking this deadlock was the human weapon created by Dr. Frankenstein. Time passes, and Vic, a mysterious girl, is traveling with Stein, a large man covered in scars.

All in order to destroy the distorted principles of this world.
description.ja: 十数年前、人狼や魔女など異形の存在との戦争に挑んだ人類は敗北の危機を迎える。その局面を打開したのはフランケンシュタイン博士が生み出した人間兵器――。時は流れ、謎多き少女ヴィクは、傷だらけの大男シュタインと旅をしていた。すべてはこの世界の歪んだ理を破壊するために。

description.en: Shou, a young boy living in the red light district is suddenly taken to live in the imperial palace. He was selected to become the prince's shadow and act as his shield. In the palace where conspiracies swirl will Shou be able to protect himself and the prince?
description.zh: 在花街柳巷看人脸色吃饭的少年・宵某天突然被皇宫收留。原因是他被选为了皇子那盾牌一般存在的「替身侍卫」，在阴谋重重的皇宫中，宵是否能保卫皇子的安全呢——⁉两名相貌如出一辙的少年相遇后，历史自此发生了巨变‼

description.en: After being reborn, Sayi vows to break free of her foster mother’s control.
description.uk: Після переродження Саї присягається вирватися з-під контролю прийомної матері.

description.en: Hidaka Akira is a high school student who loves solitude. He avoids the crowds in his class and decides to eat alone, but there is someone who disturbs his peace. It is Tsukimine Chiyo, the girl at the highest level in the school hierarchy, a girl who is absolutely beautiful. Tsukimine called Akira and asked him to do his "usual thing". What kind of "normal" did they mean, and why were her clothes off...?
description.pt-br: Hidaka Akira é um estudante do ensino médio que adora a solidão. Ele evita as multidões em sua classe e decide comer sozinho, mas há alguém que perturba sua paz. Trata-se de Tsukimine Chiyo, a garota do mais alto nível na hierarquia da escola, uma garota absolutamente linda.

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

Mu Shiba and Long Shuo — one hot-blooded and passionate, the other cold and distant. Despite their vastly different personalities, the two young men's paths cross and they set out on a journey to find the mysterious "Xiao"...
description.es: Mu Shiba y Long Shuo: uno ardiente y apasionado, el otro frío y distante. A pesar de sus personalidades tan diferentes, los caminos de los dos jóvenes se cruzan y emprenden un viaje para encontrar al misterioso «Xiao»...

description.en:
Otogiri Tobi, a 2nd grade middle school student, spends his depressing days searching for his missing older brother alongside his inhuman companion, Baku.
Tobi used to rarely speak to anyone besides Baku, however one day after his classmate Shiratama Ryuuko suddenly approaches him, his life begins to change…?

This is an adventure surrounding the “human” and the “inhuman” that a lone boy faces.
___
**Character Design:** [Mariyasu](https://mangadex.org/author/c4b0336b-a879-4634-9053-9efb11c3f71b), [Waboku](https://mangadex.org/author/03dcd51c-8a6b-4302-8c84-d943a039db25), [lack](https://mangadex.org/author/b68dc199-aaab-4deb-825a-5f3df6482b28)
___
Note: Adapted from the song and novel of the same name.

title.en: Marumaru na Kanojo ni Dekiaisarete Imasu.

altTitles.ja: 〇〇な彼女に溺愛されています。

altTitles.en: I am doted on by my 〇〇 girlfriend.

description.en:
**Link:**
- [Announcement](https://hoshida0802.hateblo.jp/entry/2024/01/21/212122)

**Note:**
- It started from the 15th of February, 2024 on Line Manga.

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女にあこがれて

description.en:
Hiiragi Utena, a girl who loves Magical Girls, lives her ordinary everyday life wishing to be like them. One day a curious character appears in front of her and offers her the power to make her wishes come true, but…  
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, the fierce battle begins!  

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official Release by Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/1110)
description.fr:
**Je fais des choses tellement horribles à mes Magical Girls préférées !**

Moi, c’est Utena Hiiragi, et comme toutes les filles de mon âge, j’adore les magical girls !
Un jour, une étrange créature aux allures de mascotte m’a lancé un sort, et je suis devenue capable de me transformer, moi aussi !
Je vais pouvoir me battre aux côtés de mes héroïnes préférées !
Enfin, c’est ce que je croyais…

C’est quoi, cette tenue scandaleuse ?
Et comment ça, je suis au service du Mal ?!

Mais qu’est-ce que c’est que cette histoire ?!

**La comédie BDSM dans laquelle s’affrontent des Magical Girls !!**

**Avec ses personnages tous plus fous les uns que les autres, Looking Up to Magical Girls balaye les genres et nous place du côté du mal ! Akihiro Ononaka déploie tout l’arsenal BDSM à sa disposition pour nous proposer un concentré d’humour légèrement sexy et complètement déjanté !**

---
**Links:**
- [Official French](https://www.amazon.fr/Looking-up-Magical-Girls-1/dp/2382750731/)
description.uk: Хііраґі Утена завжди захоплювалася чарівними дівчатами і мріяла перетворитися на круту героїню, яка бореться зі злом. Тож, коли одного вечора до неї підходить талісман, яка стверджує, що в ній дрімає магічна сила, вона тремтить від хвилювання. Але її барвиста мрія швидко розбивається об іронічний поворот подій, коли вона перетворюється на лиходійку!
description.es-la:
Hiiragi Utena, una chica que ama a las Chicas Mágicas, vive su vida cotidiana y desea ser como ellas.
Un día aparece un personaje curioso frente a ella y le ofrece el poder de hacer realidad sus deseos, pero...
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, ¡comienza la feroz batalla!
description.pt-br: Hiiragi Utena é uma garota apaixonada por Mahou Shoujo que sonhava em se tornar uma delas e poder lutar ao lado de sua heroína favorita. Certo dia, um mascote inesperadamente apareceu ao seu lado e lançou uma feitiço em Hiiragi, oferecendo a ela a oportunidade de estar de frente para sua ídolo. Entretanto, diferente do que ela esperava, a transformação a fez virar uma vilã ao invés de uma mahou shoujo. Para piorar, a mudança faz com que ela deixe de ser uma tímida garota e passe a ser uma dominatrix sádica. Agora Hiiragi precisará lidar com sua nova “profissão”, ao mesmo tempo que tenta aproveitar os momentos ao lado de sua heroína, por mais que seja para tentar torturá-la.

title.en: Bouken ni wa, Buki ga Hitsuyou da! ~Kodawari Rudy no Kajiya Gurashi~

altTitles.ja: 冒険には、武器が必要だ！～こだわりルディの鍛冶屋ぐらし～

altTitles.en: Every Adventure Needs Weapons! ~The Meticulous Rudy's Blacksmith Life~

description.en: A young girl Rudy may dream of becoming the greatest weaponsmith in the world, but right now she's just an apprentice at a hardware store. She can't help getting scolded by her master for crafting the craziest weapons! In this dungeon-city where heroes dare to delve, experience the everyday life of the regular folk that keep things running smoothly! Welcome to your "Craft Fantasy!"
description.ja: 迷宮前町の金物屋で働く見習いの少女・ルディは親方に怒られながらも奇想天外な武器を作って、世界一の鍛冶職人を目指して奮闘中。 迷宮の外側の街で冒険を支える普通の人々の日常を描くクラフト・ファンタジー！

altTitles.en: アリス・シャーロック：ルビー色の星雲

description.en:
In a world where animal people and humans cohabit with each other,  
Chief Constable Alice Sherlock is just a cowardly police officer.   
But one day, a strange turn event roped her into a robbery that is far more complex than it first seemed.   
  
**Read left to right**

In the feudal era of Japan, Ogami Itto is the elite executioner for the Shogun until the ruthless Yagyu clan frames him in an attempt to gain the position. His name dishonored and his wife murdered, Itto and his infant son Daigoro wander Japan as an assassin for hire, named Lone Wolf and Cub. Ultimately, Ogami Itto strives for revenge against the Yagyu clan.

altTitles.ja: たゆたう煙は掴めない

description.en: Chiaki, a college student without a girlfriend, meets Miyako, a waitress at a shisha store, through a matching app recommended by a friend. This is a love story that lyrically depicts a faint love that begins with a matching app and shisha.
description.pt-br: Chiaki, um estudante universitário sem namorada, conhece Miyako, uma garçonete de uma casa de shisha, através de um aplicativo de relacionamento recomendado por um amigo. Esta é uma história de amor que retrata poeticamente um sentimento inicial e delicado, nascido em um aplicativo de celular e embalado pelo aroma do shisha.

title.en: If I Don’t Die Soon, I’ll Really Become Invincible!

altTitles.en: If I Die, I will Be Invincible

description.en: Ye Qing obtained the golden finger through travel, and as long as he dies, he would be invincible. So he started to go crazy. But... Empress Da Zhou: "When I see Ye Qing's life, if he dies, I will live alone.". Upper world immortal ruler: "The world is so indifferent, but Lord Ye never hates me, I will try my best to protect him". Hundreds of millions of people: "everyone in the world can be lacking, but Lord Ye is the only saint, only Ye Qing!"
description.pt-br: Após transmigrar para um mundo de imortais, Ye Qing obteve o poder supremo!! Ele vai conseguir a invencibilidade quando morrer! Ye Qing: É hora de me encontrar com a morte! Imperatriz de Zhou: Eu achei minha alma gêmea ao encontrar Ye Qing. Com todos os meus poderes, vou me certificar de que ele viva! Imperador Imortal do reino superior: o mundo é um lugar frio e indiferente, mas o senhor Ye sozinho me mostrou o calor e a gentileza do mundo. Vou protegê-lo com todos os meus poderes! Várias outras pessoas: Ninguém é perfeito, mas somente o senhor Ye é um santo virtuoso! Ye Qing: Ei pessoal? Por que não me deixam morrer logo? A essa altura, eu já teria mesmo me tornado invencível…

description.en: "The world is not going to give anyone any help. So I chose this path. In order to survive." One event, two teenagers. Before they make their decision, what awaits them in their future?
description.pl:
„Ten świat nikomu nie pomoże. Dlatego podążyłem tą ścieżką. Aby przeżyć.”  
Jedno zabójstwo, dwóch prawie sobie obcych nastolatków. Aby zmienić przeznaczenie, wyruszyli w podróż, która wszystkiego dopełniła, choć inaczej, niż którykolwiek z nich się spodziewał.

altTitles.es-la: A partir de ahora empezamos con ética

altTitles.en: From Now on We Begin Ethics

altTitles.ja-ro: Koko wa Ima kara Rinri desu.

altTitles.ja: ここは今から倫理です。

description.en: "Ethics" is the path of humanity, a principle that becomes the norm of morality. It is not necessary to learn it, but the lessons are laden with the truths of life. Cool ethics teacher Takayanagi confronts his students' problems and their beliefs.
description.es: La "ética" es el camino de la humanidad, un principio que se convierte en la norma de la moralidad. No es necesario aprenderla, pero las lecciones están cargadas con verdades de la vida. El genial profesor de ética, Takayanagi, enfrenta los problemas y las creencias de sus estudiantes.
description.fr: "L'Éthique" est une voie de l'humanité, un chemin qui définit les normes de la moralité. Il n'est pas nécessaire de l'apprendre, mais ses leçons se construisent autour des vérités de la vie. Takayanagi, le professeur d'Éthique, se confronte aux problèmes et convictions de ses élèves.
description.id: "Etika" adalah jalan kemanusiaan dan prinsip yang menjadi norma moralitas. Tidak perlu mempelajarinya, tapi pelajarannya syarat pada kebenaran kehidupan. Guru etika yang tenang, Takayanagi, menghadapi masalah dan kepercayaan para siswanya.
description.ru: «Этика» — это путь, которым идёт человечество. Принцип, ставший нормой морали. Не обязательно изучать её, но уроки этики наполнены правдами жизни. Такаянаги, крутой преподаватель этики, борется с проблемами своих учеников и их убеждениями.

altTitles.ja: ヤンキーJKクズハナちゃん

altTitles.pt-br: Garota Delinquente Do Ensino Médio KuzuHana-chan

description.en:
At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! 

While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone.

Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
description.fr:
Au début de l'année scolaire, Saotome Hodaka intègre le lycée préfectoral de Moteshiro, ancien établissement réservé aux filles et récemment devenu mixte. Il découvre rapidement que le ratio garçons/filles est de 1:359 !

Bien que cela puisse sembler être un paradis pour certains, la majorité des élèves sont des délinquantes, et Saotome se retrouve aussitôt extorqué par certaines des filles les plus agressives. Par chance, il est sauvé malgré lui par Hanako Kuzuryu, une belle délinquante qui aspire seulement à être laissée en paix.

Est-ce le début d'une nouvelle amitié ? Comment la vie de Saotome évoluera-t-elle dans une école pleine de filles turbulentes ?
description.ja:
男女比率1対359!!　359人の女子高生にいじられまくり!!　つらたんハーレム学園ラブコメ!!　コワかわ最強ヒロイン爆誕!!
四方八方ギャルだらけな県立茂手城高校に入学した黒一点・早乙女穂高は、ヤンキーJK・九頭竜華子にピンチを救われて…!?
description.pt-br:
Uma proporção de homem para mulher de 1:359?!

Saotome-kun é admitido em uma escola cheia de gyarus e conhece uma garota delinqüente chamada Hanako Kuzuryu.

altTitles.th: Again ย้อนเวลากลับมาป่วน

description.en: After three unfulfilling years of high school, Imamura Kinichirou was finally graduating. Because of his delinquent-esque looks, he was feared by his classmates, has made no friends, and his greatest regret was not joining the ouendan (cheer club), which was now disbanded. After an accident on the day of his graduation, he and classmate Fujieda Aki are transported three years back in time, freshman again in body but with high-school memories intact. Can Imamura fix the mistakes of his past? Can he re-do his high school years in the way that he's always wanted? Again!! The universe suddenly shouts.
